content: Dad's birthday is March 15th. He'll be turning 62 this year.
Dad loves playing golf. He tries to play every Saturday morning with his buddies.
Dad complained last week that his driver is warped and he keeps slicing his shots.
Dad saw a Callaway ad during the PGA tour and said he'd love to try their new Paradym driver.
Dad's golf handicap is around 18. He's been trying to break 90 for years.
Mom mentioned she already got Dad a new watch for his birthday.
Dad's favorite color is navy blue. Most of his golf shirts are blue.
Dad retired from his engineering job last year. He's been golfing a lot more since.
For Christmas, we got Dad a nice golf bag. He really liked it.
Dad doesn't like surprise parties. He prefers small family dinners.
Dad's current driver is a TaylorMade from about 8 years ago.
Dad and I played golf together last month. He was frustrated with his long game.
Dad reads Golf Digest magazine. He always has one in the bathroom.
Dad's golf buddies are Tom, Jerry, and Mike. They've been playing together for 20 years.
Last year for Dad's birthday I got him golf balls. He said he always needs more.
Dad mentioned his putter is fine but his woods need replacing.
Dad watches the Golf Channel constantly. It drives Mom crazy.
Dad's home golf course is Pine Valley. His locker number is 247.
Dad doesn't like gadgets. He refused to get a golf GPS watch.
Dad's dream is to play Pebble Beach someday. It's on his bucket list.
